properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 5:13AM EST until February 6 at 9:49PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

Emory River At Oakdale TN affecting Morgan and Roane Counties

Moderate to heavy rain will persist across the area through today,
causing rivers to exceed flood stage today and tonight.

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Emory River At Oakdale TN.
* From early this morning until this evening.
* At 04:00 AM Thursday the stage was 26.1 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 27.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early this morning and
continue to rise to near 29.5 feet by this afternoon. The river
will fall below flood stage by late this afternoon.
* At 27.0 feet...Flooding starts on Riverview Road. Homes closest to
the river can have up to about 4 feet of water in them, while homes
on the far side of the street will have flooded yards.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
